title: Relates to authorizing certain state lands to taxation for school purposes in the county of Suffolk
summary: Relates to authorizing certain state lands to taxation for school purposes in the county of Suffolk.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

           S. 2639                                                  A. 3734

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                             S E N A T E - A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 27, 2011
                                      ___________

       IN SENATE -- Introduced by Sen. LAVALLE -- read twice and ordered print-
         ed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee on Local Govern-
         ment

       IN  ASSEMBLY  -- Introduced by M. of A. THIELE -- read once and referred
         to the Committee on Real Property Taxation

       AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in  relation  to  authorizing
         certain  state  lands to taxation for school purposes in the county of
         Suffolk

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph (f) of subdivision 1 of section 536 of the real
    2  property tax law, as added by section 1 of part W of chapter 62  of  the
    3  laws of 2006, is amended to read as follows:
    4    (f) Lands owned by the state, outside of the core preservation area of
    5  the  Central  Pine  Barrens area as described and bounded by [paragraph]
    6  SUBDIVISION eleven of section 57-0107 of the environmental  conservation
    7  law,  situate  in the Riverhead central school district [within the town
    8  of  Riverhead],  HAMPTON  BAYS   UNION   FREE   SCHOOL   DISTRICT,   AND
    9  EASTPORT-SOUTH  MANOR  CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT, county of Suffolk, where
   10  the title holder is listed as the "State of New York" on  the  [town  of
   11  Riverhead's] TOWN'S assessment roll as of [March sixteenth, two thousand
   12  six] THE EFFECTIVE DATE OF THE CHAPTER OF THE LAWS OF TWO THOUSAND ELEV-
   13  EN WHICH AMENDED THIS PARAGRAPH.
   14    S  2.  This  act shall take effect immediately and such payments shall
   15  apply to the school year commencing July 1, 2011.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03740-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to authorizing certain state lands to taxation for school purposes in the county of Suffolk
